dict.string: The second-generation Impreza debuts for 2002 and finally brings the WRX version with it to America. Offered as a sedan and a wagon, the WRX is powered by a 227-hp 2.0-liter turbo that gives it “the boundless energy of a second grader stuffed with chocolate cookies,” as we said at the time. With all-wheel drive and a suspension to match, it easily earns a 10Best Cars award.
